title: Landslide Leaves Town in Sicily Perched on a Cliff’s Edge
summary_full: “We are in a movie, in a horror film,” said a resident of Niscemi, where a widening chasm is threatening the town’s historic center.
summary_public: “We are in a movie, in a horror film,” said a resident of Niscemi, where a widening chasm is threatening the town’s historic center.
